item.title: Make a Website for Free
item.description: The best reason to write online is to share your ideas with others. Here, I’ve outlined all the resources I used to build this website. I’ll keep this page updated as I add more content and tools. Resources # Static Site Generator (SSG): Hugo Since this website is completely static (just text on a screen), an SSG was the perfect solution for customizability and fast responsiveness, while being both easy to deploy and maintain.
